name: Service Technician Copilot
tagline: Expert diagnostic support for field technicians when and where they need it
overview: The Service Technician Copilot provides real-time diagnostic support to field service technicians. It analyzes fault codes, suggests diagnostic steps, retrieves relevant service bulletins, and connects technicians with remote experts—helping resolve issues faster and improving first-time fix rates.
whatItDoes: Interprets fault codes and symptom descriptions
Recommends diagnostic steps based on similar cases
Provides access to service manuals and specifications
Connects to remote technical experts when needed
prompts: I'm seeing SPN 3226 FMI 4 on a 2021 X15 - what should I check?
Customer reports low power on hills - what's the diagnostic path?
Are there any TSBs related to this aftertreatment issue?
What's the spec for injector return flow on this engine?
I need help with a problem I haven't seen before
outputs: Connection to remote experts with context

impact.description: More issues resolved on first visit

guardrails: Assistive only—technicians responsible for diagnosis and repair
Does not authorize warranty repairs autonomously
Safety-critical repairs require certified technician judgment
Recommendations based on approved service procedures only
Expert escalation available 24/7 for complex issues
